Item.name: Acid (vial)
Item.Description: "As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the acid as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 acid damage."

Item.name: Alchemist's fire (flask)
Item.Description: "This sticky, adhesive fluid ignites when exposed to air. As an action, you can throw this flask up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the alchemist’s fire as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames."

Item.name: Ammunition - blogun needles (50)
Item.Description: "Blogun needles in a small leather pouch."

Item.name: Ammunition - sling bullets (20)
Item.Description: "A small leather pouch that contains normal spherical metal balls."

Item.name: Antitoxin (vial)
Item.Description: "A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour. It confers no benefit to undead or constructs."
